recipe_name: Oysters with a coriander and passion fruit relish
author: Lesley Waters
method: Carefully open the oysters using an oyster shucker and place on a serving plate. Place all the remaining ingredients, except the lime wedges, into a small bowl and mix well. To serve, pour the relish over the oysters and garnish with lime wedges.
ingredients: 3 rock oysters,  1 lemon, juice only,  1 lime, juice only,  150ml/Â¼ pint olive oil,  1 passion fruit, pulp scraped out,  1 tsp chilli flakes,  1 shallot, finely chopped,  small handful fresh coriander, finely chopped,  1 lime, cut into wedges, to serve
